## ExecutableRepository.execute() method

Execute a query with the given parameter object or an array of parameters

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
execute(command: Command, parameters: NamedParameters | PositionalParameters, options?: Options): Promise<AnyObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  command | <code>Command</code> | The query string or command object |
|  parameters | <code>NamedParameters &#124; PositionalParameters</code> | The object with name/value pairs or an array of parameter values |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<AnyObject>`
